items.sentence: Tom found what he was looking for under the table.
Tom gave Mary a dirty look and then left the room.
Tom gets angry at the slightest hint of criticism.
Tom seems to be trying to impress the new manager.
Tom should do that the way Mary told him to do it.
Tom showed me the pictures he took at the wedding.
Tom should have known better than to believe Mary.
She heard him scream, so she ran into his bedroom.
She promised that she would meet him after school.
She spends time with her grandmother every Sunday.
